text: Gavin Murray (born 4 August 1957) is a Scottish football player and manager. Murray played for Scottish Football League clubs Clydebank, Stenhousemuir and East Fife in the 1970s and 1980s. He then managed East Fife between 1987 and 1993. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:People from Dunfermline Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Clydebank F.C. players Category:Kirkintilloch Rob Roy F.C. players Category:Stenhousemuir F.C. players Category:East Fife F.C. players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:Scottish football managers Category:East Fife F.C. managers Category:Scottish Football League managers
title: Gavin Murray
